New Records: Christian Eriksen scored a stunning late winner to give Denmark a 2-1 victory over Sweden
Key Match Events: Christian Eriksen scored a late winner in the 86th minute
Alexander Isak scored for Sweden in the 9th minute
Pre-Game Insights: No pre-game insights provided in the article
Post-Match Reflections: Christian Eriksen cemented his spot as the Danes' most potent creative force ahead of the tournament
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at a sold-out Parken stadium in Copenhagen, Denmark
Others: The match was an International Friendly between Denmark and Sweden ahead of Euro 2024
